"ファングバンサーの皮の調達":
"My oven mitts are completely worn out.
I scorched my hands yesterday using
them, so I've had my fill. I'd like some
new ones, but not just any will do. I want
the hides of some powerful enemies.
Something with tough skin that won't
wear out too fast. Is keeping these
legendary hands safe so much to ask?
※Cae de Nv.31+ Fang Banthers
& Fang Banshees."
